attributes.action: End 7 day week London Congestion Charge zone. Return to pre-covid 5 day charge.
attributes.additional_details: Revert to week day only (Monday-Friday) charging effective immediately.
attributes.background: The 7 day per week charge bought in during covid needs to end. It’s completely unjustifiable to continue with them. They were bought in as temporary measures to deal with covid related traffic so the government should give themselves permission to extend them when covid restrictions end.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
